attributes.action: Ban the advertising of gambling websites on television
attributes.additional_details:
Television adverts on smaller channels consist mostly of the same companies under different names.

I would reference this piece stating that they have risen 600% since deregulation

http://www.theguardian.com/media/2013/nov/19/tv-gambling-ads

And it gets worse every month
attributes.background: UK television is flooded with adverts for gambling websites, encouraging people to spend money they don't have with the promise of winning millions. This should be treated the same as alcohol and cigarette advertising.
